ModMetaData.name: MorrowRim - SeedsPlease Patch
ModMetaData.author: SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
Adds seeds and extraction recipes for the plants added in MorrowRim.

-Requires SeedsPlease or Dizzy Fork
-Includes a patch for MorrowRim
-Includes a patch for MorrowRim: Moon Sugar and Skooma
-Includes a patch for MorrowRim: Alcohol
-Includes a patch for MorrowRim: Ashlands Swamp
-Includes a patch for MorrowRim: Alcohol Remade
-Includes a patch for MorrowRim: Bloodmoon
-Includes a patch for MorrowRim: Volcanic Ashlands
-Includes a patch for MorrowRim: Grazelands
-Based on the 'Elder Scrolls' series by Bethesda Game Studios.
